text: Samuel Rowe may refer to: * Samuel Rowe (antiquary) (1793–1853), English vicar and antiquary * Samuel Rowe (colonial administrator) (1835–1888), English governor of Sierra Leone * Samuel Evans Rowe (1834–1897), Methodist minister and missionary in South Africa * Samuel Harold Rowe (cricketer) (1883–1968), West Australian cricketer, footballer and administrator
title: Samuel Rowe
